page.title: 16Marshfoot Cattery, Hailsham
page.content: One of the trends of current homelife is the amount of domestic pets kept in the home. Owners going on holiday need to find somewhere to put them and in this area Marshfoot Cattery, Hailsham will look after your cat in the lap of luxury. It is a purpose built establishment run solely by a redundant P.E. Teacher who used her redundancey money 3 years ago to assist setting up the business. Perhaps a sign of the 1980s but a pampered pet can expect heating & comfort in its own insulated chalet. Fancy food fads as well as ordinary food is catered for. The main requirements are cats be vaccinated against feline enteritis & cat flu. An insurance scheme is availble in case emergency veterinary attention is necessary.
